block.p: Yamini Mehta and Frank Ochsenfeld are to be married today by Madhukar Shukla, a Hindu priest, at the Chevy Chase Country Club in Wheeling, Ill.

Ms. Mehta, who will keep her name, is the junior specialist in Indian and Southeast Asian art in New York for Christie's, the auction house. She graduated from Smith College. She is the daughter of Bharati and Chandrakant V. Mehta of Morton Grove, Ill.
Yamini Mehta and Frank Ochsenfeld are to be married today by Madhukar Shukla, a Hindu priest, at the Chevy Chase Country Club in Wheeling, Ill.

Ms. Mehta, who will keep her name, is the junior specialist in Indian and Southeast Asian art in New York for Christie's, the auction house. She graduated from Smith College. She is the daughter of Bharati and Chandrakant V. Mehta of Morton Grove, Ill.

Mr. Ochsenfeld is an associate at Sullivan & Cromwell, the New York law firm. He graduated with a law degree from the University of Freiburg in Germany and received a Master of Laws degree from the University of Pennsylvania and a Ph.D. in law magna cum laude from the University of Bonn. He is the son of Doris and Gunter Ochsenfeld of Heiligenhaus, Germany.
